mapper.select: select TRAIN_NO as TRAIN,TEST_NO as TEST,CLASS_NO as CLASSNO,MATRIX as MATRIX,MODEL_TREE as TREE,TRAIN_MODEL as MODEL from T_PREDICT_INDEX where file_id=#{fileId}
select ACCURACY from T_PREDICT_INDEX where FILE_ID=#{fileId}
select id,(id||'['||file_name||']') as idAndName from T_TRAIN_DATA
